alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 12:38AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tippah, northwestern Tishomingo, Alcorn, southeastern McNairy and southwestern Hardin Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1238 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Theo, or 10 miles northeast of Ripley, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Glen, Pineflat, Theo, Shiloh, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Falkner, Guys, Stantonville, Kossuth, Pebble Hill, Strickland, Hamburg, Collinstown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Tulu and Jobes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
